descriptor.name: GARLYER Non-Sticky Face Serum & Garlyer Bright Complete VITAMIN C Booster Face Serum
descriptor.long_desc:
Product 1: Face serum suitable for all skin types
Product 1: Instantly combats a dull skin tone and reduces dark spots when used regularly
Product 1: How to use: Cleanse skin using a face wash, Apply 3-4 drops of serum and spread evenly over the face and neck using gentle tapping motions, Use twice a day and follow up with moisturising creams
Product 1: Enriched with lemon extracts and 30 times the amount of Vitamin C of Garlyer's Bright Complete face creams to combat dark spots
Product 2: Face serum suitable for all skin types
Product 2: Instantly combats a dull skin tone and reduces dark spots when used regularly
Product 2: How to use: Cleanse skin using a face wash, Apply 3-4 drops of serum and spread evenly over the face and neck using gentle tapping motions, Use twice a day and follow up with moisturising creams
Product 2: Enriched with lemon extracts and 30 times the amount of Vitamin C of Garlyer's Bright Complete face creams to combat dark spots
